meanings.sent1: My kiths always support me when I need help.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys spending time with her kiths on weekends.
meanings.sent3: At the party, my kiths made sure I didn't eat all the cake!
meanings.sent4: In a world full of strangers, finding your kiths feels like discovering treasure.
meanings.sent5: The bond between childhood kiths can last a lifetime.

meanings.sent1: It's important to stay connected with your kiths and roots.
meanings.sent2: She felt a sense of belonging among her kiths at the family reunion.
meanings.sent3: The little puppy thought the big dog was part of its kiths.
meanings.sent4: In the vast forest, each animal stays close to its kiths for safety.
meanings.sent5: The tribe welcomed him as one of their own kiths.
